```{r}
set.seed(32)
y1 <- rnorm(3,15,8)
y2 <- rnorm(40,10,8)

# Sets: mu1 - mu2 = 0 
t.test(y1,y2,mu = 0,var.equal=TRUE)
# Or specific quantity with '$'
t.test(y1,y2,mu = 0,var.equal=TRUE)$conf.int

# F test: see that var.equal=TRUE is a correct assumption
#  - packages the confidence interval
var.test(y1,y2)

```
